string.value: I ran into #p2081004#, who's responsible for singing for the egg at #m240000000#. #p2081004# liked to sing, but was also interested in playing instruments, and wanted to make a big flute. In order to do so, she asked that I gather up #b50 #t4000231#s
I gave Pam 50 #t4000231#s. Pam seemed excited by the prospect of making a huge pan flute out of those small pan flutes and eventually play beautiful music for the eggs.
라라라~ 안녕하세요. 전 지금 제가 돌보는 알에게 자장가를 들려주고 있어요. 제가 노래를 불러주면 알이 편하게 잠들 수 있을 것 같아서요. 촌장님이 그러시는데 좋은 노래를 많이 들려주는 것이 좋대요.
전 노래뿐 아니라 알에게 좋은 악기연주도 들려주고 싶은데 마을에는 제가 다룰 수 있는 악기가 없어요. 숲에 사는 정령 헹키가 작은 팬플룻을 가지고 다닌다고 하던데 보신 적이 있나요? 그 팬 플룻을 모아서 커다란 플룻을 만들 수 있을 것 같은데 모아와 주시지 않겠어요?
헹키가 가지고 다니는 팬 플룻은 아주 작다고 들었어요. 그러니까 #b50개#k 정도만 있으면 제가 연주할 수 있는 팬 플룻을 만들 수 있지 않을까요?
좋은 노래를 들려주면 알들도 편안하게 잠들 수 있고 착한 아기 용이 태어난데요.

Lalala~ Hey, there. I've been singing lullaby to this egg I'm taking care of. I feel that by doing so, this egg will safely go to sleep. #bChief Tatamo#k said it's good to sing songs to the egg. Apparently it's great for the baby inside the egg.

My plan is to not just sing to this egg, but also play some instruments for it. Unfortunately, I do not have any instrument to play with here. I heard that Henkie, who lives in the forest, carries around a small pan flute. Have you seen it? I think if I can get a number of those small pan flutes, and combine them into one big instrument, then I think I'll really be able to play it myself. Will you help me gather up small pan flutes?
#bHenkie's Pan Flutes#k are apparently very small. I'm guessing, maybe #b50#k of those will allow me to make a playable pan flute. Don't you think so?
I truly believe that by playing beautiful, soothing music on this egg, the egg will safely fall asleep, and in the end, a healthy, kind baby dragon will emerge!

Thank you. That must be the pan flute that Henkie was carrying around with. I'm not the very best at this, but if fix it here and there, I may have myself a very useful pan flute. Thanks for your help.
Once the flute is ready, I'll go up to the tallest tree in this town and play it for the eggs. Hopefully you'll be around to listen to me play~
I'll need #b50 #t4000231#s#k in order for me to make a playable Pan Flute.
